attributes.attribute: var list=[ '4mWalk', 'Blood', 'Blood2', 'BodyCompositionWeight', 'ChairRise', 'ConclusionPhone', 'ConclusionQuestionnaire', 'ContraIndications', 'Deviation_AE_CRF', 'DiseaseSymptoms', 'EventPMT', 'GenHealth', 'HearingQuestionnaire', 'HeightWeight', 'NeuropsychologicalBatteryScoring', 'OS', //PART OF DCS_PHONE 'OSIPV', 'ProxyConChoices', //PART OF DCS_PHONE 'QualityAssuranceIH', 'QuestionnaireBoneDensity', 'SocialNetwork', 'StandingBalance', 'StroopFAS', 'TUG', 'TimeBasedProspectiveMemoryTask', 'Urine', 'VisionAcuity' ] $('clsa-dcs-f3.Participants:Admin.StageInstance.stage').asSequence().filter(function(v){ return -1!=list.indexOf(v.value()) })
